title: Reasoning and Decision Making Lab, University of Waterloo
text: Reasoning and Decision Making Lab is a cognitive psychology lab housed in the Department of Psychology at the University of Waterloo in Canada. I am currently working as a research assistant at the lab. I have/had been a part of the following studies:

title: Reasoning and Decision Making Lab, University of Waterloo
text:
Bet on Yourself (BOY)

Recruited and provided participation credits to participants on SONA (psychology research experiences online platform)
Oriented research participants to the study setting for data collection
Proofread and reviewed the study information before running the experiment

title: Reasoning and Decision Making Lab, University of Waterloo
text:
Thinking in Action (TIA)

Recruited and provided participation credits using SONA
Oriented research participants to the study setting

title: Reasoning and Decision Making Lab, University of Waterloo
text:
Cuing Confidently (CC)

Participated in SONA researcher training
Recruited and provided participation credits using SONA
Oriented research participants to the study setting

title: About
text:
I am a …

Math Enthusiast
“Math enthusiast” is the term I use to describe myself to my students. I hope to transfer my enthusiasm about math to them; my impression of math is transferable and can help students build positive associations with mathematics.


Classical Musician
I am a classically trained musician; I play the piano, viola, and flute. I am a violist of the University of Waterloo Orchestra. I hope to learn how to play the classical guitar as well.


Harm-Reduction Worker
I work as a harm-reduction worker at a local shelter in Waterloo, ON.


Researcher
My research interests include

Designing Accessible K-12 Mathematics Curriculum,
Reasoning & Decision-Making Processes in Mathematical Learning,
Examining the Roles of Self-esteem and Self-efficacy of Students in Learning Mathematics,
Teacher Education: Transferable Impressions of Mathematics, and
Supporting Students with Various Learning Needs in Mathematics Education.

This is not an exhaustive list.


Trans Activist
I am a racialized trans/non-binary person. Supporting and advocating for the trans community in various ways are essential parts of my life.

title: Social Development Lab, University of Waterloo
text: Social Development Lab is a developmental psychology lab housed in the Department of Psychology at the University of Waterloo in Canada. I am currently working as a directed studies student at the lab. I am currently working on:

title: Social Development Lab, University of Waterloo
text:
Validation of WRBS-Middle
The Waterloo Region Belonging Survey - Middle Childhood Version (WRBS-Middle) is designed to measure children’s (aged 8-13) sense of belonging in non-school contexts. As a directed studies student, I am leading the validation of the survey by

examining the internal consistency, validity, and factor structure of the WRBS-Middle
writing a formal report on the validation processes and results
